attributes.action: Save Scotland & NI's place in the UK & the EU. Push for a reverse-Greenland deal
attributes.additional_details:
There is a huge democratic mandate for both of these countries to remain in both the UK and the EU and I firmly believe that this is the best option for everyone involved. 
The Government should attempt to negotiate a "reverse-Greenland" deal to keep the UK intact whilst allowing Scotland and Northern Ireland to remain in the EU.

http://www.independent.co.uk/voices/brexit-scottish-referendum-scotland-eu-remain-nicola-sturgeon-snp-a7100736.html
attributes.background:
Two years ago 55% of the Scottish electorate voted to remain a part of the UK. 
In the recent EU referendum, 62% of the Scottish electorate voted to remain part of the EU and 58% of the N. Irish electorate voted to remain.
